subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: When the French club Toulon takes on the English team Saracens in the finals of the Heineken European Cup, all eyes will be on Toulon’s Jonny Wilkinson, who is retiring.
snippet: When the French club Toulon takes on the English team Saracens in the finals of the Heineken European Cup, all eyes will be on Toulon’s Jonny Wilkinson, who is retiring.
